name: mini boots and stockings
notes:
these tiny boots and stockings are super quick and easy! they are knit entirely in the round on dpns in one piece! the stockings consists of only 6 rounds and the boots just 3!
my favorite part is their bobble toes, which makes shaping a breeze! the pattern is also really quick to memorize, which makes for excellent tv knitting! you can knit a whole rainbow of colors if you want! if you like these you may like my [mini mittens!][2]

hope you enjoy this free pattern!
happy knitting!
natasha
